bioAsHtml: I’m a software engineer who migrated from the java world almost three years ago and I am currently working at Fabernovel Technologies (formerly Zengularity). In my day to day job, I help building reactive applications mainly using technologies from the Scala Ecosystem. My main points of interest are functional programming and concurrency.

acceptedTalks.title: Specializing the Reader monad for pure Database Programming

bio: I’m a software engineer who migrated from the java world almost three years ago and I am currently working at Fabernovel Technologies (formerly Zengularity).
